column4: Can anyone help me with installing ubuntu on a laptop? I downloaded the i386 ubuntu 6.06.1 image and burned it (md5 is correct), but the installation on the laptop always makes it freeze completely at 22%
I had that on my desktop, eventually it took.. see what memtest says ya may have bad memory
I had the exact same issue on my desktop but on the 5th try at 1am it took
